Class AFDatagramSocketImpl<A extends AFSocketAddress>

java.lang.Object

Type Parameters:
A - The associated address type.

SocketOptions
public abstract class AFDatagramSocketImpl<A extends AFSocketAddress> extends DatagramSocketImpl

    • AFDatagramSocketImpl

      protected AFDatagramSocketImpl(AFAddressFamily<@NonNull A> addressFamily, FileDescriptor fd, AFSocketType socketType) throws IOException
      Constructs a new AFDatagramSocketImpl using the given FileDescriptor (or null to create a new one).
      Parameters:
      addressFamily - The address family.
      fd - The file descriptor, or null.
      socketType - The socket type.
      Throws:
      IOException - on error.
